description.value:
This sticky salve stubbornly holds wounds closed and encourages swift natural healing. You can activate the salve in either of the following ways.

Activate 1 Interact

Effect You @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Administer First Aid]{Administer First Aid} without requiring @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Healer's Tools]{Healer's Tools}. You either gain a +2 item bonus to the Medicine check, or you can use the skinstitch salve's Medicine modifier of [[/r 1d20+13]] instead of your own.

Activate F Interact

Trigger You @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Treat Wounds]{Treat Wounds} or use @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Battle Medicine]{Battle Medicine}

Effect You gain a +2 item bonus to the triggering Medicine check. If you roll a success on the Medicine check, you get a critical success instead.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-effects.Effect: Skinstitch Salve]{Effect: Skinstitch Salve}
